ValidationRule.description: When a case is closed, a close date is required
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ( RecordType.Name = "WCA" || RecordType.Name = "Garment"|| RecordType.Name = "RCI") && ( PRIORVALUE( Status__c ) <> "Closed" && TEXT(Status__c ) = "Closed" ) && ISNULL(Case_Closed_Date__c)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: When closing a case, Closed date is required. Please enter Case Closed Date
